item.description:
We will be discussing how our language plays a role in our culture and how we structure our world.

The primary things we will be trying to understand are:

A) What role does language play in culture
B) Is there objective truth in Language
C) If language does structure our culture how much does it?
D) Could there be any idealistic concept behind words?

The key is to explore both views, analyze how they view the world, and which each feels more comfortable with each of us.

We will be looking at modern examples that explains of how these two views are interacting and waging a culture war against each other.


Natural Logic View (Augustine View)


Linguistic View
